columns.Film_ID: The unique identifier for each film record.
columns.Title: The name of the film.
columns.Studio: The production studio that created the film.
columns.Director: The individual who directed the film.
columns.Gross_in_dollar: The total box office revenue in dollars.

film.table_description: The table displays information about various films.

columns.Market_ID: The unique identifier for each market record.
columns.Country: The name of the country associated with the market.
columns.Number_cities: The total number of cities within the market.

market.table_description: The table provides details about different market regions.

columns.Estimation_ID: The unique identifier for each estimation record.
columns.Low_Estimate: The minimum estimated revenue for the film in the market.
columns.High_Estimate: The maximum estimated revenue for the film in the market.
columns.Film_ID: The unique identifier for the film being estimated.
columns.Type: The genre or type of film.
columns.Market_ID: The unique identifier for the market related to the estimation.
columns.Year: The year in which the estimation was made.

film_market_estimation.table_description: The table provides revenue estimations for films across different markets.
